insert into book_review
id,

reader_id = #{readerId,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updare_time = #{updareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
details = #{details,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
